Shipping

Class InputOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shipping.InputOutput

  • public class InputOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle input and output operations for Package.

      • findPackage

        public static int findPackage(java.util.ArrayList<Package> listIn,
                              java.lang.String caller)
        Search for a Package in the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        listIn - ArrayList of type Package
        caller - A String which tells the method who the caller was. If the caller was "removePackage", the private member variable findPackageHelper is changed to "true". This aids the method removePackage() so that it does not accidentally delete the first ArrayList item.
        Returns:
        int representing the ArrayList index of the found package
